thread.title: How to Best Reap the Health Benefits of Volunteer Work

author: Marc Agronin
title: How to Best Reap the Health Benefits of Volunteer Work

organizations.name: best reap the health benefits of volunteer work

text: Marc E. Agronin is a geriatric psychiatrist at Miami Jewish Health and the author of “The End of Old Age: Living a Longer, More Purposeful Life”. Most people become volunteers to do some good and give back to their community.
